About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do..

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

My name is Yazan Mutlaq, I am currently studying for an online master’s in computer science at the University of East London, I graduated from Al Al-bayt University in Jordan 2017 with a bachelor’s degree in computer science,
Previously, I worked in the UAE - Abu Dhabi as an administrative supervisor for SABIS International School. and currently enrolled in the Master's program at UEL, I am gaining a comprehensive understanding of IT fundamentals.
My coursework includes Advanced Software engineering, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Vision, Cloud Computing, Big Data Analysis, and more. Where I have had the opportunity to explore the latest advancements in the field. This academic background positions me well to apply for jobs as a software/web developer.

FAST

Fast load times and lag free interaction, my highest priority.

Intuitive

Strong preference for easy to use, intuitive UX/UI.

Responsive

My layouts will work on any device, big or small.

My Creative process

Creativity enables you to solve complex problems or find interesting ways to approach tasks.

1

discuss the project

One of the most important processes is to discuss the project with your teammates or clients, it helps a lot.

2

Networking

Being around people from different backgrounds can expose you to new ideas and inspire creative thinking.

3

Motivation

People will be most creative when they feel motivated primarily by the interest, satisfaction, and challenge of the work itself — not by external pressures.

4

Interaction

When you interact, you find connections between different ideas and use those connections to solve problems.
